TextView.android:text: How do I Add New Product
Follow Below given Steps: Open Expiry List > Click on + Button placed at Top Right Corner > Enter Product Details > Click on Add Button
Follow Below given Steps: Open Expiry List > Find Desired product card > Click on the pencil Icon of that card
Follow Below given Steps: Open Expiry List > Find Desired product card > Click on the Bin Icon of that card > Confirm to Delete
Follow Below given Steps: Open Expiry List > Find Desired product card > Click on the card
When you Add a Product you are Promote to enter Desire Notification Time for each Individual Product. App will send you Notifcation 7 day Prior of Expiry Date according to your chosen Time.
There is no need to Sync Data Manually Because Everytime you add new Product to the list your Data got synced between all Your Devices

Can I Use App on Multiple Devices using same Account
Yes, you can use your Account on as many devices you want.
Follow below given steps: On the Home page Click on your Name > Click Change Password > Enter your email > Press Change Button You will Recieve an email with a link to Change your Password.
Follow below given steps: On the Home page Click on your Name > Click on Log Out Option You will be sent to Login Screen.
